verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I need Thee ev'ry hour, Most gracious Lord; No tender voice like Thine Can peace afford.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: I need Thee, O I need Thee; Ev'ry hour I need Thee! O bless me now, my Savior, I come to Thee!

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: I need Thee ev'ry hour In joy or pain; Come quickly and abide, Or life is vain.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I need Thee ev'ry hour, Most Holy One; O make me Thine indeed, Thou blessed Son!
